page.title: 16HOUSING(CONTINUED)
page.content: Types of housing-Lydbrook area(cont.) More modern buildings and flats are found on a small estate below the parish church and at Worrall Hill where there are 21 detached,61 semi-detached,46 bungalows and 20 semi-detached bungalows. There are 40 terraced properties along the valley side. In Upper Lydbrook there 102 detached,23 bungalows,76 semi-detached,40 terraced and 12 flats.Most of these properties are privately owned. Postwar council semi-detached houses have been built on high land at Worrall Hill and Joys Green and not in the valley.
